data.title: Good cheesesteak fast food
data.text: I ate at the Great Steak & Potato Co today. A good cheesesteak- I like the Chicago cheesesteak sandwich. It's plenty of food and fast. Price for a large with a drink is about $13. I will eat here again.  But not too often, as it is a bit greasy.

data.title: Not quite a cheesesteak
data.text: National chain with average sandwiches. I like attempt to have a traditional cheesesteak, but the bread is not quite right and the cheese is melted on top instead of incorporated with the shaved meat. That being said, it may be a better option than standard fast food.

data.title: GREAT Sandwich
data.text: One of my favorite sandwiches is a genuine Philly Cheesesteak. The key, in my opinion, is the melt in your mouth bread. This place comes close….While it's not the real thing, (Gino's or Pat's in Philly), it's a good choice if you're near one.
